search_engine

Class Dictionary

  • java.lang.Object
    • search_engine.indexer.Dictionary

  •  class Dictionary
extends java.lang.Object
    The dictionary store all the known Vocabulary as a tuple <vocabulary,df> where df is document frequency: number of documents this word has appeared.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Vocabulary> _dictionary 
      private java.lang.String DICTONARY_FILENAME 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Dictionary() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int checkAndAddWord(java.lang.String token)
      Check for the dictionary for the token
      If the token exists in the dictionary, increase its df
      Otherwise, create a new vocabulary and set the df to 1
      Return the vocabularyID of the token in the dictionary
      void fetchDictionary()
      Fetch the dictionary from file and store into local memory
      Vocabulary getVocabulary(int vocabularyId)
      Return a Vocabulary according to the vocabularyId
      int getVocabularyId(java.lang.String word)
      Get Vocabulary Id of a word
      The word should be stemmed properly
      private Vocabulary parseToVocabulary(java.lang.String line)
      Parse a line from dictionary file into a Vocabulary
      Extract both the word (1st token) and df (2nd token) to create a new Vocabulary
      void writeToFile()
      Update the local Dictionary to file

        public int getVocabularyId(java.lang.String word)
        Get Vocabulary Id of a word
        The word should be stemmed properly
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        id if the word is found in the list
        -1 if no such word

      • checkAndAddWord

        public int checkAndAddWord(java.lang.String token)
        Check for the dictionary for the token
        If the token exists in the dictionary, increase its df
        Otherwise, create a new vocabulary and set the df to 1
        Return the vocabularyID of the token in the dictionary
        Parameters:
        token -
        Returns:
        vocabularyID

      • parseToVocabulary

        private Vocabulary parseToVocabulary(java.lang.String line)
        Parse a line from dictionary file into a Vocabulary
        Extract both the word (1st token) and df (2nd token) to create a new Vocabulary
        Parameters:
        line - from dictionary
        Returns:
        Vocabulary the parsed Vocabulary
        null if the line is syntactically incorrect
